page.title: 10Inhabitants Amberley
page.content: This area is sparsely populated, people living in small hamlets and isolated dwellings. Several families have lived in the area for generations in some cases continuing to occupy the same house. Families with a few exceptions have two or three children. No ethnic minorities are living locally. Occupations include farming, landwork and service industries. The latter being maintenance, plumbing, electrical, decorating and gardening. Many professional people settle in Amberley and the surrounding district when they retire.
